pull.title: WIP: Implement BIP9 and get BIP113 to be ready to be deployed with it as an example
pull.body:
An implementation of BIP9.

Unnecessary but good-to-have dependencies:

~~\- [ ] Interface for chain.o #7563~~
~~\- [ ] BIP113 ready for trivial deployment #7565~~

TODO:
- [X] GetMinerNextVersion()
- [X] warnings when undefined (for you) rule changes are locked_in/activated according to bip9 rules.
- [ ] Unittests

EDIT: Use BIP68 + BIP112 as example deployment instead of BIP113.

rename.from: WIP: Implement BIP9 and get BIP113 to be deployed with it as an example
rename.to: WIP: Implement BIP9 and get BIP113 to be ready deployed with it as an example

rename.from: WIP: Implement BIP9 and get BIP113 to be ready deployed with it as an example
rename.to: WIP: Implement BIP9 and get BIP113 to be ready to be deployed with it as an example

events.message: BIP9: Prepare consensus/params.h to support version bits

BIP9: Introduce consensus/interfaces.h with CVersionBitsCacheInterface

This file is intended to be compatible with a C API, thus uses simple
structs and function pointers instead of C++ classes and methods.

BIP9: Prepare miner_tests to support BIP9 calculations (sipa)

https://github.com/sipa/bitcoin/compare/bip9

BIP9: Introduce versionbits.o

TODO give proper credits

BIP9: Introduce global/server with a global variable with a concurrent
implementation of Consensus::CVersionBitsCacheInterface
BIP9: Use version bits in main::ConnectBlock(), main::UpdateTip() and miner::CreateNewBlock()

BIP9/BIP68_BIP112: Use BIP68 and BIP112 as examples of BIP9 deployment

To do so, unify nLockTime and script validation flags

Bonus: Deploy hardforks using BIP9 and the hardfork bit

squash use hardfork bit

comments.diff_hunk:

+#ifndef BITCOIN_CONSENSUS_VERSIONBITS_H
+#define BITCOIN_CONSENSUS_VERSIONBITS_H
+
+#include "params.h"
+
+class CBlockIndexView;
+class CValidationState;
+
+/**
+ * Thee version bit reserved for signaling hardfork activation to all types of nodes (previously "sign bit").
